name: Pop N’ Play (2.5-4 Years + Caregiver)
description: Pop N Play - Serves ages: 2.5-3.5 Years + Caregiver - Children and parents/caregivers have fun together, while caregivers learn how to support their child’s learning and skill development. - Activities focus on pre-literacy, arts and crafts, cooking and nutrition, exercise, math, and family bonding. - Pop N Play is a great introduction to our collaborative learning programs, and helps families prepare for Pre-K. EXCELSIOR: January, March, May, July, September, November Tuesdays and Thursdays, 11

howToGetIt: Registration opens at 9 am on the 28th, the month before. To register send email to: popnplay@fccenters.org
address: 2565 San Bruno Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94134
